description.original: Counts the words of selected text in the editor.
description.translation: Counts the words of selected text in the editor.

dict..setDesc(\"Reload required for change to: .setDesc("Reload required for change to take effect. Turn on to start collecting daily statistics of your writing. Stored in the path specified below. This is required for counts of the day as well as total counts.")
dict..setDesc(\"Turn on if you don't want mar: .setDesc("Turn on if you don't want markdown comments to be counted.")
dict..setDesc(\"Turn on if you want to displa: .setDesc("Turn on if you want to display section word counts next to headings.")
dict..setDesc(\"Set how many words count as o: .setDesc("Set how many words count as one \"page\"")
dict..setDesc(\"Reload required for change to: .setDesc("Reload required for change to take effect. The location of the vault statistics file, relative to the vault root.")
dict.p0.textContent = \"Here you can customiz: p0.textContent = "Here you can customize what statistics are displayed on the status bar when editing a markdown note."
dict.p1.textContent = \"Here you can customiz: p1.textContent = "Here you can customize what statistics are displayed on the status bar when not editing a markdown file."
